CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE CHTR.DA_HOLDING_COMPANY

AS

FUNCTION add (

,gl_id IN VARCHAR2
,gl_desc IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
) return NUMBER;

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,gl_id IN VARCHAR2
,gl_desc IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,holding_company_id IN NUMBER
,gl_id IN VARCHAR2
,gl_desc IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,holding_company_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

END da_holding_company;

body.name: DA_HOLDING_COMPANY
body.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE BODY CHTR.DA_HOLDING_COMPANY
/* Generated on 20-JAN-15 03.39.55.303649000 PM -06:00 */
AS

FUNCTION add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,gl_id IN VARCHAR2
,gl_desc IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
) RETURN NUMBER
IS
l_return_pk NUMBER;
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_holding_company.add(fx), parms=' || gl_id || '|' || gl_desc || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_holding_company a
(
a.holding_company_id
,a.gl_id
,a.gl_desc
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
)
VALUES
(
chtr.s_holding_company_id.NEXTVAL
,add.gl_id
,add.gl_desc
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
) RETURNING a.holding_company_id INTO l_return_pk;
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_holding_company.add(fx)');
RETURN l_return_pk;

END add;

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,gl_id IN VARCHAR2
,gl_desc IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_holding_company.add, parms=' || gl_id || '|' || gl_desc || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_holding_company a
(
a.holding_company_id
,a.gl_id
,a.gl_desc
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
)
VALUES
(
chtr.s_holding_company_id.NEXTVAL
,add.gl_id
,add.gl_desc
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
);
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_holding_company.add');

END add;

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,holding_company_id IN NUMBER
,gl_id IN VARCHAR2
,gl_desc IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_holding_company.add, parms=' || holding_company_id || '|' || gl_id || '|' || gl_desc || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_holding_company a
(
a.holding_company_id
,a.gl_id
,a.gl_desc
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
)
VALUES
(
add.holding_company_id
,add.gl_id
,add.gl_desc
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
);
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_holding_company.add');

END add;

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,holding_company_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_holding_company.del, parms=' || holding_company_id || '|' || audit_user || '|');
UPDATE chtr.t_holding_company a
SET a.record_stat = 'D'
,a.modified_dttm = SYSTIMESTAMP
,a.modified_by = del.audit_user
WHERE a.holding_company_id = del.holding_company_id
;
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_holding_company.del');

END del;

END da_holding_company;
